grid.description: All spacing values are multiples of 4px for consistent vertical and horizontal rhythm

tablet.note: Reduced by 33% from desktop to maintain density on smaller screens

mobile.note: Stack layouts vertically, maintain minimum touch targets (44px)

usage.xs: Icon spacing, badge padding, tight inline elements
usage.sm: Button padding (vertical), input padding, list item gaps
usage.md: Card padding (compact), section spacing, form field gaps
usage.lg: Card padding (default), component spacing, page sections
usage.xl: Page margins, major section breaks, modal padding
usage.xxl: Hero sections, empty states, maximum visual separation
